title: Relates to providing an exemption for school districts from requirements for separate specifications for public works
summary: Provides an exemption for school districts from requirements for separate specifications for public works; permits school district to assign contract to a single responsible person, firm or corporation; permits school district to require a general contractor to submit proposed subcontractor bids; directs the  commissioner of education to prepare a study on the impact of such exemption.

   18  OF ANY SCHOOL DISTRICT BUILDINGS OR APPURTENANT FACILITIES  MAY  PROVIDE

   28    D. WITH THE SUBMISSION OF THE NAMES OF THE PROPOSED SUBCONTRACTORS  AS
